text:
#SheInspires✨ Katalin Karikó: She was overlooked, scorned, fired and threatened with deportation. Now, her #mRNA research has given the world #COVID19 #vaccine.

She developed a method of using synthetic mRNA, the “software of life”, to fight viruses.

#OwnYourStory #WomenInSTEM https://t.co/ybasWNSjGD
